synopsis.text: To escape his monotonous and uninspiring life, high school student Ryouhei Arisu makes a wish on a mysterious firework, only to be thrust into a desolate parallel world known as the Borderland. Alongside his friends, Daikichi Karube and Chouta Segawa, Ryouhei must navigate a treacherous series of deadly games in order to survive and find a way back home. As they face increasingly perilous challenges, Ryouhei discovers a newfound sense of purpose and determination, pushing himself to the limits in order to protect his friends and preserve his humanity in a world where danger is always lurking. With each game more dangerous than the last, Ryouhei must use all of his wits and strength to outsmart his opponents and make it out alive. Will he be able to find a way back home, or will the Borderland claim him as its latest victim? Only time will tell in this thrilling and suspenseful tale of survival.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
